patterns: How do I cancel my subscription?
Cancel my subscription
Stop my recurring payment
Can I cancel anytime?

What happens if I cancel my subscription?
responses: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings under the 'Billing' section. If you need further help, let me know.
To cancel your subscription, log in to your account, go to 'Subscriptions,' and select 'Cancel'. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the billing cycle.
You may cancel your subscription at any time. No further charges will be applied after cancellation, and you will retain access until the current period ends.

responses: You can upgrade your subscription from your account dashboard. Go to 'Billing' and select 'Change Plan'.
Upgrading is easy! Just visit the subscription section and choose the plan you want to switch to. Your new plan will take effect immediately or at the next billing cycle, depending on our policy.
Yes, you can upgrade anytime by selecting a higher plan on our pricing page. Need help? Let me guide you!

patterns: Why did my payment fail?

Why is my payment not going through?
responses: A payment failure can happen due to insufficient funds, incorrect card details, or bank restrictions. Please check your card or try another payment method.
If your payment was declined, ensure your card details are correct or contact your bank. If the issue persists, try using a different card or payment method.
Check if your card has expired or if there are any restrictions. You can also try using a different card. If you need help, our support team is available.

To get an invoice, log in to your account and go to 'Payment History'. You can download past invoices from there.
